name: Nil and the Chamber of Echoes
name_original: Nil and the Chamber of Echoes
description:
This is a game about sound so headphones are strongly recommended.

Nil was minding his business one day, when he fell down a hole, now he has to find his way out of the Chamber of Echoes... Echoes...echoes...

Thats Nil! He's a bit tiny so you will need to help him find his way out.

There seem to be strange doors that have microphones above them... I wonder what for?

And it sounds like someone else in in here with Nil...or something

Controls

=============

Arrow Keys to Move around

P.S. I know it isn't clear how this fits into the GMTK Jam Theme of "Only One", I made it so that only one sound effect is present at any given moment, hence the Chamber of Echoes theme and the reliance on sound as a mechanic
